card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Melnia, the Aqua Shadow
card.text: ■ Multi ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Slayer

card.name: Lucky Ball
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Balbas, Lord of Devils
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Grand Devils. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever a creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose a card in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Fuuma Balzoo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Storium, Light Ray Doll
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all your other creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Fuuma Erigoul
card.text: ■ While you have another Grand Devil in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.

card.name: Fuuma Mehlwasp
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Slayer ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Asteroid Gellum, Dark Comet
card.text: ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Grand Devils, Deep Marines, and/or Zombie Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Fuuma Vines
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has "blocker" and destroys it.
